Talent.Name: Stadium of the Sacred Flame
Talent.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>After you use a Skill or Technique:</color> This card gains 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Contending Fire</color>.
When your <color=#FFFFFFFF>Contending Fire</color> reaches 2: Create 1 random basic Elemental Die.
When it reaches 4: Heal your active character for 2 HP.
When it reaches 6: Discard this card, your current active character deals +1 DMG for 2 Rounds.
